Dialogues module¶

class Dialogues.NewAssetDialogue(parent)¶

Bases: Dialog

Dialogue for creating a new asset.

Has a drop down menu with different asset types. Once an asset type is selected, the name of the asset can also be chosen. The asset is instantiated once the OK button is selected.

newAssetOK(event)¶

Creates a new asset with the selected type and name.

class Dialogues.OPENTestDialogue(parent, curves_inherit, curve_container)¶

Bases: Dialog

Dialogue for running an OPEN simulation.

Does the building case study simulation. Has a drop down menu with the ability to select either “summer” or “winter”.

TestOK(event)¶

Runs the OPEN simulation once the OK button is selected.

assets = []¶
getData()¶

Receives the data from the OPENTestdialogue.

Takes selection in order to send variables to the simulation file.

Returns:

  • season – The selected season to run the simulation with.

  • network – The network array with the names and voltages of each bus in the power system.

markets = []¶
parameters = [18, 16, 17, 90, 200, 3, 1, 0.04, 0.07, 0.1, 500, -500]¶
class Dialogues.SaveDialogue(parent, initial='')¶

Bases: Dialog

Dialogue for saving Data.

Contains a method of selecting what file type to save the data as, as well as a filename text control box.

saveOK(event)¶

Completes the data entry and saves the file.

Is activated by clicking the “OK” button in the dialogue. Once selected, the data is then sent to a file with the data selected.

class Dialogues.WebHelpDialogue(parent)¶

Bases: Dialog

Dialogue for OPEN Documentation.

Opens the website leading to the OPEN documentation in a window within the GUI.

closeOK(event)¶

Closes the dialogue.
